message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn Alice, how about a slight adjustment for a better outcome for both of us?
Meet me in the middle, 55-45 is the way to go!
Time is running out Alice, this is my final offer before I have to start thinking about getting a larger share.
Getting closer, 52-48 is the fairest deal yet!
This is getting ridiculous Alice.  Accept this now before inflation eats into your share even more.
